text:
Oh, right!
There's something I wanted to ask Amana!
Huh, what's up all of a sudden?

There are lots of boutiques around here, right?
I was curious about how Amana chooses her clothes.

Amana always starts by deciding on one item
that she absolutely wants to include.

I see...
Doesn't matter what it is?

Yep!
Whether it's outerwear or innerwear, it's all good!

Then, she builds the
rest of the outfit around that item.

But if the other pieces have too strong of a personality,
the main item might get overshadowed, so she has to be careful.

...That's enlightening. Next time I buy clothes,
I'll try combining them using that method.
